ProjectTitle: Emerging radiation Effects in On-Chip Inductors for space grade technologies
InitialFeedbackHistory:
07/02/2024
The document that you submitted does not follow the Flemish standard DMP template that FWO uses, please submit a new DMP specific for your project using this template. You can find the FWO DMP requirements on their website together with the template in word: https://www.fwo.be/en/the-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan/; we recommend however to use https://dmponline.be/ where you can find the same template with additional guidance.
